snippet: The investigation was prompted by reports of sexual assault, drug use, cheating and other violations of the academy’s honor code.
abstract: Air Force Academy officials say that superintendent Lt Gen Michelle D Johnson has begun investigation into allegations of sexual assault, drug use and other misconduct among its cadet athletes.
lead_paragraph: The investigation was prompted by reports of sexual assault, drug use, cheating and other violations of the academy’s honor code.

headline.main: Air Force Academy to Examine Conduct of Cadet Athletes
headline.print_headline: Air Force Academy to Examine Conduct of Cadet Athletes

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
